application.name: FreeMedForms EMR
application.summary: The FreeMedForms Electronic Medical Record Manager

description.p: FreeMedForms aims to be a open Electronic Medical Record Manager. FreeMedForms is also a lot of derivatives sub-project, which are just standalone compilation of FreeMedForms plugins.
This project is a free and open source project. A community grows up around it. FreeMedForms and derivatives is released under the terms of the GPLv3 License. Some parts of the code are LGPL v2.1.
